physical_appearance:This is a batik bib. It is triangular in shape
 with a string at the top. It is embroided with a floral border. There is a patchwork pattern in the middle.
subject_terms_1:flowers (motifs) embroidery (visual works) Peranakan childrenswear
subject_terms_2:Batik  Motifs Embroidery Peranakan (Asian people) Children\u0027s clothing
subject_terms_3:Peranakan costumes Batik
sgcool_label_text:This triangular-shaped bib is made from a patchwork of cotton batik and simply embroidered with a floral border where it would have been tied around the neck of the child. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
